metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20203 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: In multiple locations of the nanopb library, there is a possible way to corrupt memory when decoding untrusted protobuf files. This could lead to local escalation of privilege,with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: nanopb package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
